text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/validation
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    noneneededNone neededNo validation needed/planned for this resource or element.
    initialInitialValidation is only needed after initial attestation. For elements that typically do not change such as 'medical school attended and graduation date'.
    periodicPeriodicValidation is needed after initial attestation and on a periodic basis. E.g. elements that expire or may change such as licensure.

name: VhDirPrimarySourceValidationNeed
title: VhDir Primary Source Validation Need
publisher: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description: Attested information may require validation once, on a periodic basis, or in the case of information that is only self attested no validation at all. This value set defines a set of codes that describe how often validation is needed, if at all.
